row.process:
:SET &date_jour# = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL('YYYYMMDD') :SET &datedeb# = SUB_DAYS(&date_jour#,2) :SET &datefin# = SUB_DAYS(&date_jour#,1) :PRINT " Début Audit &datedeb# Fin Audit &datefin# Client &CLIENTNR#" :SET &runid# = SYS_ACT_RESTART_ME_NR() :SET &CLIENT#=FORMAT("&CLIENTNR#","0000")
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" cd &PATH_UTILITY# if not exist "&PATH_AUDIT_REP#" ( mkdir "&PATH_AUDIT_REP#" ) set rc=0 ! ! Boucle de traitement des différents types d'audit ! :SET &varlist# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(VARA.LISTE_TYPES_AUDIT) :PROCESS &varlist# :SET &type# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&varlist#,1) echo ************************************* echo Exécution de l'Audit &type# avec commande : echo ucybdbrr -V -B -LE -C&CLIENTNR# -F&type# -O&PATH_AUDIT_REP#\&CLIENT#\Audit_&datefin#_&type#_&runid#.txt -D1&datedeb#000000 -D2&datefin#000000 -A -X echo ************************************* echo. ucybdbrr -V -B -LE -C&CLIENTNR# -F&type# -O&PATH_AUDIT_REP#\&CLIENT#\Audit_&datefin#_&type#_&runid#.txt -D1&datedeb#000000 -D2&datefin#000000 -A -X set /A rc=%errorlevel%+%rc% :ENDPROCESS
@set retcode=%rc% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
:CASE "UNIX" cd &PATH_UTILITY# [[ -d "&PATH_AUDIT_REP#" ]] || mkdir "&PATH_AUDIT_REP#" rc=0 ! ! Boucle de traitement des différents types d'audit ! :SET &varlist# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(VARA.LISTE_TYPES_AUDIT) :PROCESS &varlist# :SET &type# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&varlist#,1) echo "*************************************" echo "Exécution de l'Audit &type# avec commande :" echo "./ucybdbrr -V -B -LE -C&CLIENTNR# -F&type# -O&PATH_AUDIT_REP#/&CLIENT#/Audit_&datefin#_&type#_&runid#.txt -D1&datedeb#000000 -D2&datefin#000000 -A -X" echo "*************************************" echo "" ./ucybdbrr -V -B -LE -C&CLIENTNR# -F&type# -O&PATH_AUDIT_REP#/&CLIENT#/Audit_&datefin#_&type#_&runid#.txt -D1&datedeb#000000 -D2&datefin#000000 -A -X return_code=$? rc=$((${return_code}+${rc})) :ENDPROCESS
exit $rc
:OTHER
:ENDSWITCH

row.pre_process: :PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN# :INC JOBI.CLIENT_WITHOUT_AUDIT, NOFOUND=IGNORE :INC JOBI.UNIX_SHELL, NOFOUND=IGNORE :INC JOBI.ALIAS, NOFOUND=IGNORE
